ygData.subject: Re: Split shot
ygData.msgSnippet: I witnessed a triple shot on my person.  My suspicion is that it is not fake.  I will meet him again and try to take screenshots this time.  Might I suggest we
ygData.messageBody:
I witnessed a triple shot on my person. My suspicion is that it is not
fake. I will meet him again and try to take screenshots this time. Might I
suggest we comb the LFAy zone (he was armed with a lark twitter bow ... is
it the bow that allows split shots?) ... possible the ranger station might
have quests?


>
>no first is right... but found out .. it will be in next patch.. so not in
>game yet... will be after the 12 th of oct.. in new sol temple zone
>
>later karver
>
>ps that split shot skill ... soo far as i acn tell and have tallked to
>eqanswer web site it is a fake.
>
